at light 2

Honestly one of the greatest games ever made along with the og half-life. The story is well written and interesting, the gameplay is really fun. The  graphics (for 2004) are sublime and do take into consideration this was the same year GTA san Andreas came out and was a major graphical step up from the og half-life. Whether its fighting alien zombies, biologically modified soldiers , giant insects or alien gun ships , its safe to say you wont be starved of fighting bad guys.

Youtube üzerinden izleyerek zaten oyunu bitirmiştim ama oyunun detayını yüzdeye vurmak gerekirse , 
%30 bir yerlere gitme % 45 bulmaca çözme %25 aksiyon - belki ben oynamadan önce video izleyerek bitirdiğim için olabilir ama beni sarmadı , ki distopik bir dünya konseptini çok sevmeme rağmen sarmadı. Bulmacalar gerçekten sıkıcı oluyor bazen hele oyunun ilk başlarında gıcık ediyor adamı ayrıca eski oyun olduğu için sana gideceğin yeri asla söylemiyor 15 saatte bitmesinin en büyük sebebidir , geze geze 15 saat oldu diyebilirim. Steam'in oyunsuzluk zamanına denk geldik , bir daha açıp oynar mıyımmmmmm yüzde %30 ihtimal veriyorum bilemedin %20.

Even after 16-17 years, Half-Life 2 holds up as one of the greatest shooters of all time - if there's games that ought to go down in history for their awe, this is one of them.

ГЕНИАЛЬНАЯ ИГРА

Компьютерная игра, научно-фантастический шутер от первого лица, сиквел Half-Life, разработанный компанией Valve, издаваемый ими же и Sierra Entertainment. Игра была выпущена в 2004 году, получила всеобщее признание и собрала множество наград и более 45 титулов «Игра года 2004». В 2012 году Half-Life 2 была награждена на Spike VGA 10 как лучшая игра десятилетия.

Rise and Shine Mr. Freeman, Rise and Shine.                                                                                                        
 
Not that I wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job. No one is more deserving of a rest. And all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until...well, let's just say your hour has come again.

The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.

So, wake up, Mr. Freeman. Wake up and smell the ashes.

Let's start with the game itself, it's so good that it was chosen the game of the year, and the game of the decade, Half Life 2 is a sequel to the much-acclaimed Half Life of 1998, both games are perfect and very good, but the The reason why I give a negative rating to the game, is because of the countless bugs that appear to me during my gambling.
1. The Npc are not responding well, Ex: When you enter an elevator, the NPC does not enter with you the first time, you have to load and try several times to get it
2. Brightness bug, when I was in the capitol of Nova Prospekt, the game simply increased the brightness to the maximum and it was not possible to resovler, and brightness like that makes the game very difficult, and it hurts your eyes.
Yes Half Life 2, you are an excellent game, but this version of you is terrible.

"It has a little something for everyone"

Таки дошли ручки. Можете спокойно покупать, если хотите отличное продолжение первой части этой серии. Игра, которая может войти в ваши любимые, точно рекомендуемые, хорошие.
[h1] Сюжет [/h1]
Повествует нам о продолжении похождений Гордона, где помогает гражданским в сопротивлении Альянсу и вообще защите Земли, но это будет обоснованно и интересно.
[h1] Геймплей [/h1]
Простой геймплей шутеров и игр на движке Source, чувствуется также. Играется хорошо и приятно, мб не всегда так и будет.

I'll be honest; I was never attracted to this game. I always saw it all around Gmod but it didn't look like the type of game I'd like, as I'm usually into more cartoony or, well, "childish" games. But I started diving into it some months ago, and I kept seeing videos and things of it and got interested. So I bought it. I haven't completed the full game but it is already one of my favourite games, and I can tell why it is regarded as one of the best games ever. This game is absoloutely incredible, and I love it. I would recommend it, obviously, and I don't regret buying it. Can't wait for HL3 :>

На удивление столкнулся с парой реальных проблем в ОФИЦИАЛЬНОЙ СТИМОВСКОЙ версии игры.
В моменте, когда на мосту навстречу несется поезд, почему-то невозможно успеть съехать с дороги, как ни старайся.
Второе - когда Аликс заряжает телепорт после ухода Моссман и Вэнса, враги должны переть волнами, но кроме первой пары комбайнов я тупо ждал, пока опустился портал, врагов больше не было. Смазывает впечатление от великой игры.

Valve's timeless classic that raised FPS standards
- Physics-based puzzle
- Simple gunplay that requires good positioning and proper gun selection for various enemy types
- Unique gun types, SMG with grenade launcher, crossbow for long range combat, organic substance that summons giant insects, and most importantly, gravity gun to smash combine soldier with toilet seat
- AI interactions that makes the game more alive
- The atmosphere of a destroyed society under the command of an Intergalactic Dictatorship can be seen along the way thanks to environmental storytelling
Best storydriven game ever!
